docs.snippet: Utility and consumer stocks took losses on Tuesday. Earlier, bank stocks across Europe fell after the results of a stress test on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Utility and consumer stocks took losses on Tuesday. Earlier, bank stocks across Europe fell after the results of a stress test on Friday.
docs.abstract: Stocks fall as investors fret about state of United States economy.

headline.main: Wall St. Falls, Led by Consumer Companies
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Slides as Insecurity Spreads

docs.snippet: The most promising way to improve the nation’s standard of living, some academics argue, is to expand the work of government....
docs.lead_paragraph: The most promising way to improve the nation’s standard of living, some academics argue, is to expand the work of government.
docs.abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene asserts there is vigorous case for more government, not less, as most promising method to better nation's standard of living and boost economy; contends times are changing in unexpected ways with presidential election approaching; says sense of opportunity for change is prevalent, despite fact that small government Republican orthodoxy is likely to prevail in Congress for years to come

headline.main: The Case for More Government and Higher Taxes
headline.print_headline: The Case  for More  Government,  Not Less

docs.snippet: The new service from Facebook’s photo-sharing app will let people share photos and videos that have a life span of no more than 24 hours with friends who follow them....
docs.lead_paragraph: The new service from Facebook’s photo-sharing app will let people share photos and videos that have a life span of no more than 24 hours with friends who follow them.
docs.abstract: Facebook's photo-sharing app Instagram introduces Instagram Stories, allowing users to share photos and videos for up to 24 hours with friends who follow them; service is much like rival's Snapchat Stories.

headline.main: Instagram Takes a Page From Snapchat, and Takes Aim at It, Too
headline.print_headline: Instagram Takes a Page From Snapchat  (and Takes Direct Aim at Its Rival App)
